mapper.select: select * from product pd where pd.sptwocode =#{twoid} limit 0,6

SELECT pd.*,so.sponename,st.sptwoname,sh.spthreename FROM product pd INNER JOIN spone so ON so.sponecode = pd.sponecode INNER JOIN sptwo st ON st.sptwocode = pd.sptwocode INNER JOIN spthree sh ON sh.spthreecode = pd.spthreecode WHERE pd.pcode =#{pid}
